channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 Reasons To Bring Your ‘Authentic Self’ To Work—By A Psychologist
item.description: Stop exhausting yourself by hiding your true self. Embrace authenticity, and you’ll unlock fulfillment and new opportunities at work and in life.

item.title: A labor of love

item.title: No, The DoJ Hasn’t Said Musk Is Shipping Amazing Energy-Saving Device
item.description: Scammers are promoting a device that they say can cut domestic energy use by 90%.

item.title: Northern Lights Forecast: Here’s Where Aurora Borealis May Be Visible Tonight
item.description: The aurora may be visible in Washington, North Dakota, South Dakota, Minnesota, Wisconsin, Michigan, Maine and the northernmost parts of New York.

item.title: How Web3 And Blockchain Are Transforming Advertising Through Transparency
item.description: Web3 offers a new approach where blockchain plays a crucial role in creating more transparent, user-focused and efficient advertising.
